channel.title: Graphic Design on Nicola Iarocci

item.title: Archivio Grafica Italiana
item.description:
“Archivio Grafica Italiana is the first online archive dedicated to the entire Italian graphic design heritage.”

Beautiful resource. Some samples came as a true surprise to me, like the New York City Subway signage, though the Italian connection is a bit weak on that one. (via)
item.content:encoded:
“Archivio Grafica Italiana is the first online archive dedicated to the entire Italian graphic design heritage.”

Beautiful resource. Some samples came as a true surprise to me, like the New York City Subway signage, though the Italian connection is a bit weak on that one. (via)
